price: Walang kaluluwa malibang dito ay may isang [anghel na] tagapag-ingat.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
